title: pixel 2 rear camera not working since a month
content:
camera has suddenly stopped working in March month.

Tap and hold on camera app and selecting take a selfie option works 8/10 times. but main camera rarely opens. and whenever it opens, it mostly captures blur images. 

steps followed till date
1. lens cleaning:  several times
2. clear cache and data from app settings : several times
3. uninstall updates of Google camera app : 5 - 6 times
4. update camera app: 5 - 6 times
5.system/specify update : 2 times
6. factory reset and backup: 2 times.

after few of the crashes, I have reported a problem to google and attached system logs that time.

please look into this issue. I waited patiently for a month before writing something on thi forum
